description:
Leonardo , Donatello , Raphael and Michelangelo are back in the new version of Ninja Turtles , completely redesigned full of action , adventure and endearing characters . Produced with the most advanced technology in computer graphics , animation features and has inspired traits in Japanese and American cartoons .

Considered one of the most popular children's television programs in 1980 , The Tartaurgas Ninja is a classic , global property created in 1984 by Kevin Eastman and Peter Laird . First debuted as a successful comic book series and then became a successful TV show , an animated series for television and then there were four releases blockbuster in theaters . The creation was also translated into a significant consumer products business - with DVDs , video games , toys and more - that has generated billions of dollars .
